snippet.title: Gameplay Teaser | Project Kyzen - Mini Battle Arenas (MiBAs)
snippet.description:
In PROJECT KYZEN players collide in fast-paced 3rd person Party Games. 

We call 'em MiBAs - Mini Battle Arenas!

Imagine Fortnite smashed together with Fall Guys!

Hop into 5 Unique Gameplay Modes and SHOOT, FIGHT, RACE, COLLECT, and STRATEGIZE - WITH or AGAINST friends, at home or around the globe.

Clip this teaser and post to your shorts, tagging us and you'll be automatically entered to WIN KOINS - our in-game currency! Use them to buy incredible new items for your Avatar.

Join our Discord server to enter the conversation, and get ready to see the FULL TRAILER on Thursday!

In the meantime, the best way to stay up to date is by connecting with our social accounts, linked below!

Discord: https://discord.gg/8B3yyv7KHN
X: https://twitter.com/projectkyzen
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/projectkyzen/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/projectkyzenofficial
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@projectkyzen
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/projectkyzen

The next phase of Project Kyzen launches August 22nd, 2024.

#projectkyzen #kyzen #videogames #gameplay
